snippet: New York should become the fourth state to allow undocumented immigrants to receive government tuition aid. It would be a wise investment.
abstract: Editorial expresses support for bills introduced in the New York State legislature that would allow undocumented immigrants to receive government tuition aid; urges Gov Andrew Cuomo to endorse the bills, holding that they represents an important and inexpensive investment in the dreams of young immigrants.
lead_paragraph: New York should become the fourth state to allow undocumented immigrants to receive government tuition aid. It would be a wise investment.

keywords.value: Dream Act (Development, Relief and Education for Minors Act)
keywords.name: subject
